snippet: Charlie Austin made a glorious start to his Southampton career when the striker's superb late header earned the visitors a 1-0 win over a listless Manchester United in the Premier League on Saturday....

headline.main: Austin Header Gives Southampton 1-0 Win at Manchester United
headline.print_headline: Austin Header Gives Southampton 1-0 Win at Manchester United

lead_paragraph: Charlie Austin made a glorious start to his Southampton career when the striker's superb late header earned the visitors a 1-0 win over a listless Manchester United in the Premier League on Saturday.

snippet: Brazilian playmaker Willian has agreed a new four-year contract with Chelsea, the Premier League club said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Willian Signs New Four-Year Contract at Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Willian Signs New Four-Year Contract at Chelsea

lead_paragraph: Brazilian playmaker Willian has agreed a new four-year contract with Chelsea, the Premier League club said on Tuesday.

snippet: West Ham United will be without strikers Enner Valencia and Andy Carroll for Sunday's FA Cup tie against Blackburn Rovers, but playmaker Manuel Lanzini is back in first-team training for the first time since Jan. 2....

headline.main: Carroll, Valencia Out of FA Cup Tie Against Blackburn
headline.print_headline: Carroll, Valencia Out of FA Cup Tie Against Blackburn

lead_paragraph: West Ham United will be without strikers Enner Valencia and Andy Carroll for Sunday's FA Cup tie against Blackburn Rovers, but playmaker Manuel Lanzini is back in first-team training for the first time since Jan. 2.

snippet: Liverpool striker Divock Origi is ready for "war" ahead of his team's Premier League trip to local rivals Everton on Monday, saying both sides will be fired up for the encounter....

headline.main: In-Form Origi Braced for Feisty Merseyside Derby
headline.print_headline: In-Form Origi Braced for Feisty Merseyside Derby

lead_paragraph: Liverpool striker Divock Origi is ready for "war" ahead of his team's Premier League trip to local rivals Everton on Monday, saying both sides will be fired up for the encounter.

snippet: Ecuador striker Enner Valencia has had an arrest warrant revoked by police, who appeared to chase the striker following the national team's 3-0 win over Chile on Thursday....

headline.main: Ecuador Striker Valencia Has Arrest Warrant Revoked-Agent
headline.print_headline: Ecuador Striker Valencia Has Arrest Warrant Revoked-Agent

lead_paragraph: Ecuador striker Enner Valencia has had an arrest warrant revoked by police, who appeared to chase the striker following the national team's 3-0 win over Chile on Thursday.

snippet: The former Manchester United and Netherlands defender Jaap Stam is the new manager of English Championship side Reading, the club confirmed on Monday....

headline.main: Stam Named as New Reading Manager on Two-Year-Deal
headline.print_headline: Stam Named as New Reading Manager on Two-Year-Deal

lead_paragraph: The former Manchester United and Netherlands defender Jaap Stam is the new manager of English Championship side Reading, the club confirmed on Monday.

snippet: Everton lost their first Premier League game of the season after being tormented once again by Bournemouth's Junior Stanislas....

headline.main: Bournemouth's Stanislas Proves Everton's Tormentor Again
headline.print_headline: Bournemouth's Stanislas Proves Everton's Tormentor Again

lead_paragraph: Everton lost their first Premier League game of the season after being tormented once again by Bournemouth's Junior Stanislas.

snippet: Chris Brunt is in contention for a return to first-team football with West Bromwich Albion next month after a long injury layoff, the Premier League club said on Tuesday....

headline.main: West Brom's Brunt Close to Comeback After Lengthy Layoff
headline.print_headline: West Brom's Brunt Close to Comeback After Lengthy Layoff

lead_paragraph: Chris Brunt is in contention for a return to first-team football with West Bromwich Albion next month after a long injury layoff, the Premier League club said on Tuesday.

snippet: West Ham has signed Italy forward Simone Zaza on loan from Juventus for a fee of 5 million euros ($5.6 million) as the club's 11th recruit of the transfer window....

headline.main: West Ham Signs Italy Forward Zaza on Loan From Juventus
headline.print_headline: West Ham Signs Italy Forward Zaza on Loan From Juventus

lead_paragraph: West Ham has signed Italy forward Simone Zaza on loan from Juventus for a fee of 5 million euros ($5.6 million) as the club's 11th recruit of the transfer window.

snippet: Liverpool left back Jon Flanagan has joined fellow Premier League side Burnley on a season-long loan, the Merseyside club said on Friday....

headline.main: Liverpool's Flanagan Joins Burnley on Season-Long Loan
headline.print_headline: Liverpool's Flanagan Joins Burnley on Season-Long Loan

lead_paragraph: Liverpool left back Jon Flanagan has joined fellow Premier League side Burnley on a season-long loan, the Merseyside club said on Friday.
